title: Passing `--configuration=debug` to the bootstrapper now generates a debug library
body:
**Description of Change**

This PR pulls in the idea from #1405 and adds on to that. It also makes sure all the other flags are correct for a better debug build.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1405
- Fixes #1402

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
